plan_context.query: Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. It should be one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.and write it onto a notion page called quantum

steps.task: Compose a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are in one paragraph written in the style of lecture notes and write this note onto a Notion page called quantum. The note should mention the rapid progress of quantum computing, the use of quantum bits for parallel computation, and how their performance is measured by factors beyond classical clock speeds.
